articles.title: Google debuts ‘Disco,’ a Gemini-powered tool for making web apps from browser tabs - TechCrunch

articles.content: Google on Thursday introduced a new AI experiment for the web browser: the Gemini-powered product Disco, which helps to turn your open tabs into custom applications. With Disco, you can create what G… [+2115 chars]
